artist: Artist: Suzuki Mutsumi; Artist: Suzuki Misako
catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 806
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: reddish orange lacquer with light green cloud design; gold speckled interior; round, flat-topped lid; body slightly narrows at bottom
medium: Red lacquer with gold and silver
text: Kyoto-based husband and wife team Mutsumi and Misako Suzuki produce lacquerware of original design and subtle beauty. Mutsumi creates the finely carved wooden cores which he finishes in lustrous red or black lacquer. His wife, Misako, decorates the surfaces with designs in sprinkled gold and silver powder. The stylized clouds on this tea caddy is reminiscent of a common brocade pattern used for priests' vestments, and is thus appropriate for the solemn atmosphere of the tea ceremony.
title: Tea caddy with clouds
